typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> forfcrenttran
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> rentfcrent
forfcrenttran, rentfcrent union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fcrentals.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> rentalsmerged
